entry.title: New York Nights by Bond N. 9 (unisex)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chio's New York
Type:
Price: 232.88

Bond No 9 New York Nights by Bond No 9 is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bond No 9 New York Nights was launched in 2017. Top notes are gardenia, carnation and jasmine; middle notes are flowers, sea notes, patchouli and sandalwood; base notes are coffee and caramel. Imported.

entry.title: Ziryab Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Majda Bekkali
entry.summary:
Vendor: Majda Bekkali
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 185.00

Ziryab Perfume by Majda Bekkali, Ziryab was a remarkable man from baghdad who fled to andalusia where he became renowned as an astronomer and musician, famously creating a five-stringed lute and instigating the first conservatory of music in europe. This spa-like fragrance is an ode to the brilliant man and his legacy, with five layers of scent including tulip, oud, saffron, cedar and amber. This floral woody scent was released by majda bekkali in 2017 as part of the andalus collection.

entry.title: Zikariyat El Habayab Concentrated Perfume Oil Free From Alcohol (Unisex) By Swiss Arabian
entry.s:type: Concentrated Perfume Oil Free From Alcohol (Unisex)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Swiss Arabian
Type: Concentrated Perfume Oil Free From Alcohol (Unisex)
Price: 41.00

Zikariyat El Habayab Perfume by Swiss Arabian, Romance is in full bloom with the first spritz of zikariyat el habayab by swiss arabian. This intoxicating perfume takes the senses on a hazy garden journey of love, lust and desire. It opens with the unforgettable aroma of rose, violet and everlasting flower.

s:variant.title: 3.2 oz Concentrated Perfume Oil Free From Alcohol

entry.title: Zenne Extrait De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Nishane
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nishane
Type: Extrait De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 195.00

Zenne Perfume by Nishane, Launched in 2017, zenne, from turkish perfumier nishane, takes its inspiration from the flirty female characters of turkish shadow plays of yore. This fruity, floral scent can be worn by women and men, and it would be suitable for both daytime and evening use. It opens with top notes of grapefruit, rhubarb, and blackcurrant.

entry.title: Yes I Am The Star Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Geparlys
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geparlys
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 46.00

Yes I Am The Star Perfume by Geparlys, Rich and exotic, yes i am the star is a unisex fragrance from french perfumier geparlys. This scent blends floral and fruity accords with darker elements to create an aromatic mood full of mystery and romance. The fragrance opens with top notes of heliotrope, jasmine, and bergamot for a classic introduction, but quickly, the heart notes of sandalwood and leather make their presence known.

entry.title: Yerbamate Eau De Toilette Spray (Unisex) By Lorenzo Villoresi
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lorenzo Villoresi
Type: Eau De Toilette Spray (Unisex)
Price: 99.44

Yerbamate Perfume by Lorenzo Villoresi, Women looking for a perfume with green accords should definitely try yerbamate by lorenzo villoresi firenze. This fragranceâ€™s release date was in 2001. Green notes are present throughout the top, middle and base of this perfume.

entry.title: Xj 1861 Naxos Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Xerjoff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Xerjoff
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 259.00

Xj 1861 Naxos Perfume by Xerjoff, Xj 1861 naxos is a 2015 scent from xerjoff for both men and women, designed to celebrate the beauty and cultural heritage of sicily. The mediterranean-inspired fragrance features the calming herbal scent of lavender along with bright, juicy citrus notes of lemon and bergamot orange. At the heart of the fragrance, enjoy rich, spicy notes of cinnamon, cashmeran, jasmine and honey.

entry.title: Xerjoff Wardasina Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Xerjoff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Xerjoff
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 240.00

Xerjoff Wardasina Perfume by Xerjoff, Italian perfume house xerjoff introduced an enigmatic fragrance in 2019. Xerjoff wardasina blends masculine and feminine elements for a unique fragrance that anyone can wear. The scent opens with herbal top notes for a fresh, green sensation.

entry.title: Xerjoff Red Hoba Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Xerjoff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Xerjoff
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 335.00

Xerjoff Red Hoba Perfume by Xerjoff, Suitable for both women and men, xerjoff red hoba is a sweet oriental fragrance. It was designed by perfumer chris maurice and launched by xerjoff in 2014. Bright notes of bergamot come together with spicy cardamom and cinnamon in the top layer.

entry.title: Xerjoff Oud Stars Gao Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Xerjoff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Xerjoff
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 245.00

Xerjoff Oud Stars Gao Perfume by Xerjoff, A compelling unisex fragrance inspired by the traditional arabic perfumes, xerjoff oud stars gao is a heady oriental woody scent that commands attention. The fragrance combines the notes of oud, amber, ssaffron, patchouli, cypriol oil, juniper, resins, and gurjan balsam. This scent has amazing longevity.

entry.title: Xerjoff Opera Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Xerjoff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Xerjoff
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 169.00

Xerjoff Opera Perfume by Xerjoff, First introduced in 2019, xerjoff opera is a mesmerizing wood and flower musk that fuses luxuriant yellow florals with sweet rose, fresh spice and subtly animalic musk. The scent opens with mellow tones of blended fruit and turkish rose. Ylang ylang, sensuous and shimmering, blooms at the heart, harmonized with warm nuances of amber, nutmeg and suede.

Xerjoff Opera Perfume by Xerjoff, First introduced in 2019, xerjoff opera is a mesmerizing wood and flower musk that fuses luxuriant yellow florals with sweet rose, fresh spice and subtly animalic musk. The scent opens with mellow tones of blended fruit and turkish rose. Ylang ylang, sensuous and shimmering, blooms at the heart, harmonized with warm nuances of amber, nutmeg and suede.

entry.title: Xerjoff Amabile Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Xerjoff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Xerjoff
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 220.00 - 305.00 (2 variants)

Xerjoff Amabile Perfume by Xerjoff, First released by xerjoff in 2020, xerjoff amabile is a warm and spicy woody aromatic scent enhanced by elements of fresh citrus, sheer florals and powdery musk. Opening notes are bright and breathless, a radiant blend of amalfi lemon, calabrian bergamot and tart-sweet green apple mingled with lush hints of orange blossom. Jasmine blooms heady at the heart, spiced with subtle nuances of cardamom and soft pink pepper.

entry.title: Xerjoff Accento Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex Tester) By Xerjoff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Xerjoff
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex Tester)
Price: 180.00

Xerjoff Accento Perfume by Xerjoff, Xerjoff accento by xerjoff, released in 2011, complements the complexity of the modern world while incorporating aromas that harken back to simpler times. This unisex fragrance opens with a tantalizing burst of pineapple, hyacinth and citrus notes. The seductive zestiness continues with an enticing heart of iris, jasmine and pink pepper.

entry.title: Wulong Cha Extrait De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Nishane
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nishane
Type: Extrait De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 190.00

Wulong Cha Perfume by Nishane, Launched by nishane in 2015, wulong cha is a fresh and fruity fragrance that can be worn by both women and men. Top notes of orange, lychee, bergamot and mandarin orange are bright and energizing, making this a perfect choice for a sunny spring or summer day. Heart notes of nutmeg and tea complement the sweetness that comes both before and after.

Wisal Dhahab Perfume by Ajmal, Wisal dhahab perfume by ajmal. This fragrance was released in 2015. It is a floral woodsy musky scent for women.

entry.title: Winter Palace Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Memo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Memo
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 209.00

Winter Palace Perfume by Memo, Exotic and fresh, citrus-y and oriental: winter palace, a unisex scent from parisian perfumier memo, is ideal for men or women who like to create an air of mystery. Introduced in 2019, this fragrance takes you on a tour of flavors and aromas. With top notes of bergamot, grapefruit, lemon, and mate, this scent begins with a tart beginning.

entry.title: Wind Heat Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By The House Of Oud
entry.summary:
Vendor: The House Of Oud
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 146.00

Wind Heat Perfume by The House of Oud, Fiercely individual, wind heat is an uncompromising fragrance for women first released in 2016. Animalic base notes include suede and musk, the former of which is soft but persistent, while the latter is relentless in its strength. Floral middle notes of peony, rose, and freesia bring a lightness and freshness to the profile, while the top note of pink pepper adds a spicy nuance.

entry.title: Widian Black V Extrait De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Widian
entry.summary:
Vendor: Widian
Type: Extrait De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 200.00

Widian Black V Perfume by Widian, Inspired by the excitement of the roaring twenties, widian black v is a sweet and floral fragrance for women and men. It was released by widian in 2015. Fruity top notes of peach and lemon mingle with warm cinnamon in the opening layer.

entry.summary:

White Rose No 1 Perfume by Swiss Arabian, Exude elegance and confidence with a spritz of white rose no 1 by swiss arabian. This mesmerizing perfume blends an array of notes around a distinct and timeless heart of rose. The vivid and seductive aroma of rose starts the fragrance and is enhanced with aldehydes.

Vendor: D.S. & Durga
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 170.00

White Peacock Lily Perfume by D.S. & Durga, White peacock lily is a dreamy aquatic white floral fragrance whose dew-kissed accords are the perfect complement to spring and summer days.

entry.title: White Fire Extrait De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Tiziana Terenzi
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tiziana Terenzi
Type: Extrait De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 125.00

White Fire Perfume by Tiziana Terenzi, This is a unisex fragrance created by the house of tiziana terenzi with perfumer paolo terenzi and released in 2012. Men and women will enjoy wearing this airy warm aquatic scent. Allow this perfume to give you a cool breeze across you skin.

entry.title: Warek Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex) By Kajal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kajal
Type: Eau De Parfum Spray (Unisex)
Price: 195.00

Warek Cologne by Kajal, Launched by kajal in 2017, warek is an oriental fragrance suited for use by both men and women. An aromatic and earthy combination of incense and saffron forms the top layer. Patchouli, guaiac wood and amber enhance the earthy element in the heart, softened by floral rose notes.

entry.title: Voyage D'hermes Eau De Toilette Spray with Pouch (Unisex) By Hermes
entry.s:type: Eau De Toilette Spray with Pouch (Unisex)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hermes
Type: Eau De Toilette Spray with Pouch (Unisex)
Price: 90.00

Voyage D'hermes Perfume by Hermes, Take an aromatic excursion without leaving home with voyage d'hermes. This scintillating fragrance for both men and women features sensuous notes that will help you make an unforgettable impression. Released in 2010 by the design house of hermes in collaboration with perfumer jean-claude ellena, this svelte unisex scent features opening notes of amalfi lemon and cardamom that give way to a heart of tea before ending with a base of musk and woods for a fragrance that will stay with you all day long.

s:variant.title: 3.3 oz Eau De Toilette Spray with Pouch

entry.title: Voyage D'hermes Pure Perfume Spray (Tester Unisex) By Hermes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hermes
Type: Pure Perfume Spray (Tester Unisex)
Price: 90.00

Voyage D'hermes Cologne by Hermes, This is a woody musky scent from the prestigious french luxury company. Composed by master perfumer jean claude ellena, it is dynamic and transports you on a journey of the senses. The notes are redolent of foreign encounters and include cardomom, sparkling citruses, gigner, vegetals, and exotic woods.
